sentences.cn: 辛楣 道: “ 你这人没良心!

sentences.en: Chao Hsin - mei , you scoundrel, you shameless wretch, seducing a married woman.
sentences.cn: 赵辛楣, 你这混帐东西! 无耻家伙!引诱有夫之妇.

sentences.en: Did you see the shameless way she was chucking herself at him?
sentences.cn: 你看她涎皮赖脸地追求他了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dr. Stavely described the document as a'shameless piece of sales promotion ".
sentences.cn: 斯塔弗利医生把那份文件说成是 “ 推动销售的厚颜无耻的东西了 ”.

sentences.en: He blarneys the ladies with the most shameless lies.
sentences.cn: 他用最无耻的谎言向那些女士们谄媚.

sentences.en: He is always shameless, and is repulsive to others.
sentences.cn: 他总是这样没皮没脸的, 招人讨厌.

sentences.en: He was so shameless that he said she loved him.
sentences.cn: 他竟这样恬不知耻地说她爱他.

sentences.en: In one word , for exploitation, veiled by religious and political illusions , naked , shameless, direct, brutal exploitation.
sentences.cn: 总而言之, 它用公开的 、 无耻的 、 直接的 、 露骨的剥削代替了由宗教幻想和政治幻想掩盖着的剥削.

sentences.en: Jou - chia said with a smile, " What a shameless rat you are.
sentences.cn: 柔嘉笑道: “ 你这人不要脸,无赖!

sentences.en: Miss Su's condemnation of Fang Hung - chien for being shameless was actually unjust.
sentences.cn: 苏小姐骂方鸿 渐 无耻,实在是冤枉.

sentences.en: Now that she had spoken out, Tigress warmed up. " Me, shameless ? Look who's talking !
sentences.cn: 话都说出来, 虎妞反倒痛快了: “ 我 不要脸?

sentences.en: She is quite shameless about her ambition.
sentences.cn: 她对她的野心全然不知羞耻.

sentences.en: She's quite shameless about wearing sexy clothes at work.
sentences.cn: 她穿着性感的衣服上班而不觉羞耻.

sentences.en: the shameless way he lied to us
sentences.cn: 他对我们恬不知耻的撒谎

sentences.en: Those'shameless " people who choose to live in unearned idleness have a good conscience too.
sentences.cn: 那些乐意过不劳而获的悠闲岁月的 “ 无耻 ” 之徒也心安理得.

sentences.en: When pressed, he would make shameless excuses.

words.tran_cn: 可耻的；不体面的；不道德的；猥亵的
不知羞耻地；厚着脸皮地
羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
无耻的；不要脸的；伤风败俗的

trans.tran_cn: 无耻的，不要脸的，猥亵的，伤风败俗的
trans.tran_en: not seeming to be ashamed of your bad behaviour although other people think you should be ashamed
